divs: sighting detailsi left my house in ola arkansas, at approx. 520 am to pay a bill at danville at the drop off box, internet bill. i took i believe it is hwy 27, you can look on the map , it may be hwy 28, but as i got on the long quiet hwy that seems to take forever to get to dardanelle, long boring road, i noticed a star in the sky that had a tail attached, it seemed to be way out in the universe, a few minutes later , i saw the same star alot closer up to the upper left of my drivers side window, and it appeared to be alot closer,... as in hovering over the nebo mountain. i thought oh its the radio tower but still felt on edge and watched as it moved with in a 100 feet of me and i could see florecent lights 3 , on each side of a triagular figure. i kept thinking i am close to nebo mountain that has to be their lights, but the lights moved closer, i became really scared... rolled up my windows, ran off the road twice trying to get a good look and i saw the same rotating lights 3 on each side of a triangle. my car started a constant vibrating sound(soundelike a flat tire)i started to call 911 and my phone was dead, it was fully charged . then all of a sudden there was a flash, like a light bulb had totally illuminated the road and my vehicle. and then the drive home was non-eventful, my car was driving sound and secure and as i drove futher i was no where near mt, nebo.although i watched my vehicles clock the entire time , there was no missing time in the event.\ what also i would like to add is that this is the second encounter of ufo activity i hve encountered, and 3 othter people in 3 different places can back me up, because in or around 2003 or sometime in that area, 3 different people have seen what i have seen in three different places at the same time. also we have a nuclear plant in london arkansas, it is not far from us, we are in the evacuation route area if this helps any.also when i got to work i checked my tires and all were fully inflated, no signs of a flat. my phone did not work the rest of the day , i had to fully recharge when i got home, i didnt think it was gonna work for a while, took alot of charging.
